6debf178-4b6e-4e98-821c-b61d603a0b9c: Additional {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} from Sword of Heaven are now maximized.
1d2ec80b-8fda-4c33-8139-56d2ca23850d: All enemies in a 50-foot radius are dealt {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d10{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per your mythic rank (half {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire{/g}, half unholy). If after this damage their {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} is lower than ten times your mythic rank, they must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}. If they fail that saving throw, they die. Base {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} to this saving throw is equal 10 + half your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier.
40046f1d-9c09-4e9e-b46f-31e85ed9ecdd: All enemies in a 50-foot radius have to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}. If they fail it, they become enemies to everybody and start attacking targets indiscriminately. Base {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} to this saving throw is equal 10 + half your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier.
de190c12-a13c-4537-a070-dc8f4186a42e: An emissary of Hell vested with the power of law and evil, the Devil commands anything and everything imaginable through strength and sheer will.
7cd55a5e-d6e3-41b5-9612-26fad5c27b53: Angel can now imbue weapons of others with the same holy power. Angel can still imbue weapons of only one creature.
47991899-644c-4cc1-b1a4-5bcbc109968f:
Angels can imbue their weapons with holy power. Weapons imbued with holy power deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, while {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities used while holding imbued weapons deal an additional 2 dice of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} an additional 2 dice of damage.
You can use Sword of Heaven a number of times per day equal to 1 plus half your mythic rank.
0ec8c5fd-3c5d-4f51-84c2-c5148d869bda:
As you become a Devil, you gain the ability to issue Hell's Decrees a number of times per day equal to his mythic rank.
If a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} is involved, its {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is 10 + double the devil's mythic rank.
8492b557-a412-4990-9069-fa29cfd22dc1:
Demon adopts the aspect of Babau, gaining a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} equal to half of the Demon's mythic rank plus one.
An aspect of Babau increases the user's sneak attack {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} during demonic rage by {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g}. Any creature that strikes the Demon with a Babau aspect during demonic rage with a non-{g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} melee weapon suffers 2d6 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g}. Both these damages increase by 1d6 at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.
bfd1b03e-e534-49ef-a155-fc57b7a49a77:
Demon adopts the aspect of Brimorak, gaining a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Use_Magic_Device}Use Magic Device{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} equal to half of the Demon's mythic rank plus one. Those bonuses do not stack with other bonuses from demonic aspects.
Any creature that strikes the Demon with a Brimorak aspect during demonic rage with a non-{g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} melee weapon suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases by 1d6 at 6th and 9th Demon's rank. Whenever the Demon with an aspect of Brimorak casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that deals damage in demonic rage, that spell deals +2 point of damage per dice rolled. The bonus to damage increases by one at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.
fe892490-80f2-4a61-9b54-6200adb47dd9:
Demon adopts the aspect of Incubus, gaining a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} equal to half of the Demon's mythic rank plus one. Those bonuses do not stack with other bonuses from demonic aspects.
Whenever the Demon with an aspect of Incubus casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} or uses an ability during a demonic rage, increase it's {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} by 1. This bonus increases by one at 6th and 9th Demon's rank. While in demonic rage, the Demon with an aspect of Incubus gains a +4 bonus to weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}. The bonus to damage increases by two at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.
de4eb355-018f-4484-87dd-8ece55d89bab:
Demon adopts the aspect of Kalavakus, gaining a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Use_Magic_Device}Use Magic Device{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} equal to half of the Demon's mythic rank plus one. Those bonuses do not stack with other bonuses from demonic aspects.
While in demonic rage, the Demon with an aspect of Kalavakus gains a +2 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g}, and natural armor to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. The bonus increases by one at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.
Whenever the Demon with an aspect of Kalavakus succeeds at a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} during a demonic rage, the Demon can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} against that target as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. When the Demon with an aspect of Kalavakus hits with a charge attack during a demonic rage, the Demon can attempt to disarm the target as a free {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}.
cbd28e95-5d8f-4705-91f0-eedd6804504a:
Demon adopts the aspect of Nabasu, gaining a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Religion}Lore (religion){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Use_Magic_Device}Use Magic Device{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} equal to half of the Demon's mythic rank plus one. Those bonuses do not stack with other bonuses from demonic aspects.
While in demonic rage, the Demon with an aspect of Nabasu gains a +2 bonus on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. The bonus increases by one at 6th and 9th Demon's rank.
During a demonic rage, all enemies within 30 feet of a Demon with an aspect of Nabasu gain a -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to Fortitude saves and a -1 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}. These penalties increase by one at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.
b75aa437-7245-4dd5-a49d-96c1f8c675ec:
Demon adopts the aspect of Schir, gaining a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} equal to half of the Demon's mythic rank plus one. Those bonuses do not stack with other bonuses from demonic aspects.
While in demonic rage, the Demon with an aspect of Schir gains a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} rolls. The bonus increases by one at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.
During a demonic rage, the Demon with an aspect of Schir gains a Powerful Charge ability, increasing the number of weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}dice{/g} by two and applying an additional one and half of the Demon's {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} bonus to damage from charge.
096383ee-0dc0-49cf-a26b-fe9552d5e35d:
Demon adopts the aspect of Succubus, gaining a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_World}Knowledge (world){/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} equal to half of the Demon's mythic rank plus one. Those bonuses do not stack with other bonuses from demonic aspects.
During a demonic rage, all enemies within 30 feet of a Demon with an aspect of Succubus gain a -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saves{/g} and a -1 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, while all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 bonus to Will saves and attack rolls, and an immunity to compulsion and fear effects. These penalties and bonuses increase by one at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.
c2617a86-5a92-425b-9edc-1cc2fd21d38d:
Demon adopts the aspect of Vrock, gaining a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_Arcana}Knowledge (arcana){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_World}Knowledge (world){/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Religion}Lore (religion){/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} equal to half of the Demon's mythic rank plus one. Those bonuses do not stack with other bonuses from demonic aspects.
While in demonic rage, the Demon with an aspect of Vrock gains a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attack{/g} rolls. The bonus increases by one at 6th and 9th Demon's rank. All {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and non-physical abilities that the Demon with an aspect of Vrock uses during a demonic rage count as {g|FeatureReachSpell}Reach spells{/g}.
During a demonic rage, all enemies within 30 feet of a Demon with an aspect of Vrock gain a -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saves{/g} and move as if on difficult terrain. These penalty increases by one at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.
e24296d5-c58a-4a43-8c29-f8de776a5e19: One ally goes into battle madness. Until the end of combat, the ally {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} enemies indiscriminately, but gains a number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to ten times your mythic rank. Additionally, each time this ally kills a target, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/{g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against movement impairing, paralyzing and stunning effects until the end of combat. This bonus stacks up to 5 times.
8b860693-c36a-4945-88c3-142f702fedf7: One ally is ordered to only use one {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}school of magic{/g}, but the potency of their {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} increases considerably. {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}Caster level{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against this ally's spells is increased by half your mythic rank.
4fd5aedd-7ff5-40dc-8f60-b667eb28867d: Sword of Heaven now lasts for 1 minute per mythic rank.
012a8b9d-29f9-415e-9988-7e8c06e3704b:
The Devil gains the ability to place Hell's Seals on allies. They activate when certain conditions are met.
You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your mythic rank, but only one seal can be placed on a single ally at one time.
b7761b7e-9ef3-433c-9264-6b89a559b9fb:
The power of the Abyss courses through the Demon waiting to be unleashed. The Demon can enter a demonic rage as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. The demonic rage lasts until the end of combat. While in demonic rage, the Demon gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throws{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} for all saving throws against Demon's {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities are increased by 2. These benefits increase by 1 at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.
You can use Demonic Rage 3 times per day. Number of uses increases by 1 at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.
2e5bd69e-9af6-48e7-81dd-fcba1f22eb36: Weapons of the angel become a bane to all diseases. A creature wielding them becomes immune to diseases. {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Healing{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} cast by that creature now remove all diseases from the target and also remove {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g}, {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g}, {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g}, and {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g} conditions. Creatures that apply diseases on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} or are otherwise closely linked to diseases suffer an additional 50% of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from the wielder as {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}.
6eb4bcfd-ab1f-4db8-a6d3-b2777a37a805: Weapons of the angel become a bane to all guile. A creature wielding them becomes immune to compulsion effects. {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Healing{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} cast by that creature now remove all mind-affecting effects from the target. Creatures that commonly use compulsion suffer an additional 50% of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from the wielder as {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}.
32ec6dde-fb19-4547-89de-f1e0d9ea6282: Weapons of the angel become a bane to all poisons. A creature wielding them becomes immune to poisons. {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Healing{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} cast by that creature now remove all poisons from the target and heal all {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} and ability drain. Creatures that apply poison on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} or are otherwise closely linked to poisons suffer an additional 50% of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from the wielder as {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}.
4b92f552-0dfa-49b1-a236-ed9d4540c2ed: Weapons of the angel become a bane to all undeath. A creature wielding them becomes immune to death effects and energy drain. {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Healing{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} cast by that creature now remove paralysis and all negative levels from the target. Undead creatures suffer an additional 50% of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from the wielder as {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}.
c461105b-301e-4e81-bdc7-51eac69a2de3: When the ally would become {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g} or {g|ConditionFrightened}frightened{/g}, they instead gain the benefits of the {g|SpellsHeroicInvocation}heroic invocation{/g} and {g|SpellsRage}rage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your mythic rank.
408d30f1-21e7-46a1-b686-a29bab3df69a: When the {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} of the ally drops below 5×mythic rank, they immediately die, dealing all enemies in a 30-foot radius {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d10{/g}×mythic rank {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (half {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire{/g}, half unholy) in the process.
7188acd8-39aa-4d13-ae22-e195fb6ed453: When your ally is making a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} against an Illusion or Enchantment {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, they automatically succeed. Additionally, the caster is then targeted by the same effect, with the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of its saving throw increased by a number equal to half your mythic rank.
787275c5-fa7b-4c42-b878-54e11298d288: When your ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} drops below 15×your mythic rank, the seal deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} per your mythic rank {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (half {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire{/g}, half unholy) to all enemies, and they must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} or start burning for 2d6 (half fire, half unholy) damage each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} to this saving throw is equal 10 + half your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier.
3af54b38-aa81-40ac-9d9e-3ee0e1962935: When {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} is dealt to your ally, they are {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} for ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} per mythic rank) {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g}, and their {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} deal additional 2d6 unholy damage for the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your mythic rank.
3a69d6f2-f196-42ab-a3f6-d6e7abeefbea: You gain the ability to use the authority of Hell to shape mythic powers into other forms. Three times per day, you can gain the ability to use Sword of Heaven ability with one improvement or Demonic rage with one aspect for the next ten minutes.
8a383650-ff54-4348-8849-4982345d86bd: You gain the ability to use {g|SpellsDominateMonster}dominate monster{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like ability{/g} at will. Additionally, you gain fire {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} 20 and a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against poison.
59508b7d-8a4b-4567-ba6e-01f07487ec18: You gain the ability to use {g|SpellsHellfireRay}hellfire ray{/g} and {g|SpellsPowerWordStun}power word stun{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g} at will. Additionally, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to fire, cold and acid {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} 10, and all your weapons count as being {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}Lawful and Evil{/g}.
e130ec21-48a1-4c6a-b4b6-c5d981ea942a: You gain the ability to use {g|SpellsOverwhelmingPresence}overwhelming presence{/g} and {g|SpellsPowerWordKill}power word kill{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g} at will.
afe51d5f-e74c-45fc-a3e3-78fd329fa8dc:
You grant one ally the ability to mark an enemy as the target for the hunt. You lose control of this ally immediately, and they try to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} the prey, gaining a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to attack and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} equal to your mythic rank.
This effect lasts until the end of combat, or until the target is dead.
3b22975a-d4ba-45eb-b10e-77d5ef73a779: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g} with the imbued weapon now mark the target for 1 minute, making the target visible, giving the target a -40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}stealth checks{/g} and a -4 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
